name: Tears of a Dragon
description:
This is Tears of a Dragon
We all have inner demons that sometimes tell us to do the wrong thing.
Savage Dragoon is in a constant battle to conquer the darkness lurking within himself...Also known as his "Dark Passenger".

Where his story ends...You Decide...

This game is based on a true story, that being my own and my constant battle against depression. Meet the people who have been a large influence in my life as well as members of my family.Main Features:
  • Multiple story endings for replayability
  • Your choices in the story affect the route you take
  • 10 playable characters/party members
  • Free to save your game at any time!
  • More than 50 special powers and spells
  • 30 unique enemies
  • More than 50 items between potions, weapons, shirts, and armour
  • Challenging dungeons to explore
  • Provide for your family by taking on mercenary work
  • Meet Savage Dragoon's Dark Passenger. Will he take control?
